Title: LOL (Laughing Out Loud) ®
Writer: Lisa Azuelos (scenario & dialogue), Nans Delgado (scenario & dialogue)
Actors: Sophie Marceau, Christa Théret, Jérémy Kapone, Marion Chabassol
Plot: When Lola's boyfriend is unfaithful to her on his summer holiday, she dumps him and flirts with his best friend as punishment. But as their class prepares to leave on an excursion to London, the relationship heats up.
